mapper.insert: insert into boards (title, content, category, member_id) values ( #{title}, #{content}, #{category}, #{member_id})
mapper.select: select b.id, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.like, b.createdAt, b.category, m.id as member_id, m.email as member_email, m.name as member_name from boards b join members m on b.member_id = m.id where b.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update boards set title = #{title}, content= #{content}, updatedAt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id = #{id};
